website_summaries.verdict: Pack of blind spot mirrors gives you an improved view of what’s directly behind you.
pros: When you’re snowmobiling with a group of people or if you’re towing a toboggan, use this handy mirror to see what’s directly behind you
Set consists of four small circular mirrors that are easy to attach to your existing mirrors
An aluminum frame around the mirror provides a high level of durability
cons: Glass is flatter than it should be, so the viewing angle isn’t the best

customer_reviews.title: completely flat and non-adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm old-fashioned but these are the kind of spot mirrors that I grew up with flat non-adjustable and curved stick them where you want them and drive I like this because when it comes to cleaning ice off your mirrors you don't have to worry about knocking them off like the bulky ones that swivel or move around so you can angle them correctly I buy these again
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: happy with these effective mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what to expect. As recommended in the product instructions, I adhered mirrors to lower outside corner of mirrors and am glad that I did. The adhesive holds well (3M adhesive sticker)- even with freezing rain, and rain. After a couple of weeks or so, I am unsure how I ever lived without these. No more blindspot- easily see cars now alongside me, and can even use for backing into parking spaces- can see the parking space lines even when parked.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but excellent service from vendor.
customer_reviews.text: Slim design. Double stick tape is as thick as the mirror. Might weather well, we'll see. Will repost in a year or sooner, if problems arise. 4 of these is probably overkill but this older, slimmer design is no longer available locally. If the first pair work, I'll put the second pair on my pedelec trike. Have yet to road test. Update: Actually, the mirrors work surprisingly well and they take up very little space. Cheap insurance for the added peace of mind and a lot less neck twisting in the bargain.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. Sharrow

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: I was wary of affixing anything on my vehicle that may be hard to remove later. I wanted better visibility without constantly turning my head to check the blind spot. (Sure, I can lean forward and look at the mirror to check too but since I sit way back it's easier said than done.) The mirror also helps to see the parking lines without adjusting anything. I place mine on the driver side, on the top right and adjust the entire side mirror all the way so I can see only the next lane over. The mirror sits flush. Great purchase. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: M. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cars
customer_reviews.text: A lot of these stick-on blind-spot mirrors are made for trucks and they’re too big for cars. But these are smaller and perfect for cars. I like my Tesla Model 3, but try and try and I can’t get the driver’s side mirror adjusted to completely elliminate the blind spot. One of these little mirrors solved that problem. They’re discreet and easy to apply. They’re not adjustable, but that’s not necessary and just makes a blind-spot mirror larger, fragile, and complicated. These are simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gollnick

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how many times these blind spot mirrors saved me from a wreck. If you are big on safety for you and your loved ones I recommend these blind spot mirrors. These make driving safer by providing more visibility and reducing the need to look over your shoulder and away from the road while you are trying to check your blind spot. They are very easy to adhere to your mirror and instructions are provided on the packaging. These hold up well through hot and cold conditions alike, even in car washes. These have saved me (and my insurance rates) many times by preventing side swipes or collisions with cars in my blind spots.
customer_reviews.author: Verified Consumer

customer_reviews.title: They don’t even show the blind spot!
customer_reviews.text: First thing: they’re cheap. That’s not a big deal though because as long as it works the quality wouldn’t matter but they don’t work! There isn’t enough curve to actually increase my field of view. My little jeeps mirrors show pretty much the same field of view. I pulled them off after a few days and replace them with something that is actually effective. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: Best little blind spot mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Best little blind spot mirrors! Trust me I have gone through a bunch of different brands over the years. My husband and I usually replace our vehicles within 2 years and the blind spot mirror is one of the first things I install on all my vehicles. These mirrors are by far the best ones I've come across. They are a great size, almost flush with the mirror itself, but has a small (silver) ring around the outside. Fits my mirrors well, matches my silver SUV perfectly and it's great that they come in a 4 pack. I've had them on my car for a few months and they seem stuck pretty well. No complaints and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: momma2jnw

customer_reviews.title: Scratched, poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Mirrors were all scratched up & had some smudges on them. Tried cleaning off with a microfiber cloth, but it didn't help. Even in my well-lit garage, images in the mirror were fuzzy due to the scratches. Seemed to have slightly less of a curve/field of vision than my existing blind spot mirror, which is another negative.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: Blind spot mirrors arrived quickly and installed easily. Actual day time temp was 97°F when installed but the 3M adhesive held firm then and since. Only 2 inches in diameter, the diminutive size obscures little of the factory mirror but provides enhanced rearward visibility and a sharp image.
customer_reviews.author: 24bics

customer_reviews.title: Useless on my Subaru Outback. So tiny I have to lean over and squint to make anything out in them.
customer_reviews.text: Useless on my Subaru Outback. So tiny I have to lean over and squint to make anything out in them. Dangerously small - cannot look in them safely while on 6 lane highway. Need to be larger. RETURNED THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my Gold Wing and Harley motorcycles
customer_reviews.text: They are a good size for my motorcycle mirrors. Go on easily and stick well. Very clear image. I installed them in the lower outside edge of both the left and right side mirrors on my Gold Wing and Harley Electra Glide. They give me a good view of the blind spots on both sides. I would recommend them, very fair price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Eli P.

customer_reviews.title: A good deal for a surprisingly rare item
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers, I chose this particular mirror because I preferred the thinner profile to the ability to rotate and tilt. Despite its ubiquity several years ago, this 'non-adjustable' style proved impossible to find locally. That said, the quality of these was a bit disappointing. I wasn't expecting a lot for the price, but one of the mirrors has a scratch across it and another fits loosely in the metal back plate. They are what they are though and they still do the job. I put the scratched one on the passenger side which is at such a distance that it isn't noticeable anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Keara Clemons

customer_reviews.title: ... for years now and this one seems to be pretty good. The best thing about this is slim ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had some sort of blind spot mirror for years now and this one seems to be pretty good. The best thing about this is slim profile, which was the main reason i bought this - you wont even feel that there is anything stuck on the mirror. The only issue i noticed was as its a complete curve, it shows you everything than the ones which are tilted, which only show the blind spot area. So all the view makes things smaller so had me focusing on it to see what is in the blind spot area. That's the only reason i rated it 4stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep

customer_reviews.title: Not a big improvement
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to help with the blind spot in my new SUV. I have used bigger blind spot mirrors on my trucks before, but this SUV has cute little mirrors and I didn't have much space I could cover up. The curvature of these mirrors wasn't enough to make a significant difference in my view. When a vehicle slips into my blindspot using the regular mirror, I can still see the very back of that car in the blindspot mirror, then the vehicle disappears completely. I am taking these off to install something else. They have been installed about a month.
customer_reviews.author: RonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought these years ago.
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are very helpful for both seeing other cars in your blind spots and in parking. I used to hope I was parking between lines in those very small parking spots but now I just look in my blind spot mirrors and park dead center. The blind spot mirrors also help me to avoid hitting the curb while parallel parking thus saving my rims.
customer_reviews.author: Foxpro

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Quality Overall
customer_reviews.text: These are real glass with aluminum frame. They are pretty good quality overall compared to some others I've tried. The adhesive isn't great though. I removed the adhesive from the back and replaced it with a piece of 3M VHB black foam tape (sold on Amazon). 3M VHB (very high bond) tape is the same type used by manufacturers to adhere side moldings to cars. It sticks (and stays) very well.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates that blind spot in your exterior rearview mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these convex mirrors. They're easy to install and do not come off easily. I have 2 of them on the driver and passenger side exterior rearview mirrors. They help considerably and eliminate the blind spots in both mirrors. However, I still recommend to always quickly check by turning your head and visually check before making lane changes if possible. Safe driving everyone!
customer_reviews.author: keith e.

customer_reviews.title: I love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these, and on my second order of a set of 4. Have installed it on my cars, even those with lane departure sensors, because there is no button to accidentally turn them off of a fuse to blow. They blend in very well into the mirror and unlike ones that have a raised edge on one side or are adjustable, these always give you a uniform view with the largest viewable angle. The glue works very well and haven't had any problems with them coming off. If you have to take them off (and I have had to in the past), it's fairly simple, just use a razor blade and pry them off.
customer_reviews.author: Ramin A.

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice 3M stick-on convex mirrors for widening your view on the sides of your vehicle. Extremely useful on my mid size pic up truck. Installation was easy and took less than 5 minutes (1 each per side mirror) simply: clean the mirrors, peel the backing off the 3m strip, locate, and stick, that's ALL! The mirrors have taken highway speeds, an automated car wash, bumps, abrupt stops, etc. with no issues at all. I still have the unused set of mirrors in case I do loose one down the line. If so, I'll update my review for everyone's information.
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: Great services  got upgraded pack
customer_reviews.text: Buying these for my new car but the place where I got them previously don’t sell them anymore. These come in 2 pack and another 2 pack that let you choose fix or adjustable angles. To my delight one of the two pack has the exact ones I’m looking for, fixed mirror without the ugly tin metal borders. Easy mount and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eaxactly what I've Been Looking For
customer_reviews.text: All the auto part stores sell now are the plastic adjustable ones, which I tried only to have the mirror fall out of the holder in less then a week. What I had been looking for are the metal backed non adjustable ones like I have used in the past. Found them here on Amazon, these go on easy and stay on, are low profile, exactly what I had been looking for. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Good performance at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 2017 Jetta. The price was very low so I was skeptical on what the quality would be like. Well the quality was excellent. I liked its small size. I liked the clarity - probably due to the fact that these are glass. I liked that they have a very narrow frame. Plus the mirror was thin - most I've looked at in stores are very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Nagy

customer_reviews.title: perfect size in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: 1. it's not a "rotating" type mirror. Why would anybody want that? Spend all that time to adjust a mirror and then it can move around 360? No thanks. 2. although small very easy to see what i wanted and hoped i could see with this mirror attached (blind spots, parking lines, curbs, etc.) simple, effective, solid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they DON"T need to be adjusted. I had ones that adjust and they are a pain, every time you wash the car or bump the mirror you have to re-adjust, these do not and they still work great! Highly recommend if you are looking for high quality no fuss blind spot mirrors that don't need to be adjusted and work great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trailblazer15

customer_reviews.title: Glass is almost flat...
customer_reviews.text: And therefore not usable. These mirrors are advertised as convex, they are but maybe 1%, not enough to gain any added sight area advantage over regular side view mirrors on the vehicle. They need to be at least 8-10 degrees convex or above the flat plane to gain any advantage. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Didn't need four, but love the size!
customer_reviews.text: I put this type of mirror on every vehicle I have owned. I like the smaller size for more compact vehicles which tend to have less real estate compared to larger vehicles. It is such an easy way to minimize your blind spot. Gave the two extras to a friend who was stoked since his vehicle has large blind spots.
customer_reviews.author: zeilstar

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but too small
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. No concerns there. The angle of view is a little too wide (or the mirror too small) to make it more than 3 stars. The driver side mirror on my SUV is helpful for reversing, but doesn't give me the confidence to depend on it solely for lane changes. The passenger side mirror is of no use.
customer_reviews.author: Leitz

customer_reviews.title: Ok mirrors but they keep nagging you for reviews
customer_reviews.text: Ok to use, not the highest quality but do the job. The Jessica from their quality assurance team keeps nagging me about leaving a review. Jessica, this is not my priority and I don't appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I'm a new driver and my friend told me blind spot mirrors help a lot. They really do! Before I got these I was beyond skittish about lane changes because I wasn't used to them and checking my blind spot. With these I can see everything so I feel a lot safer doing it. Plus the mirrors stick VERY well! So make sure when you place them that you're sure on the spot you want cause they aren't going to budge after that
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great safety product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set of 4 blind spot mirrors for my Jeep Wrangler. I put one on each of the door mirrors and one set on the mirrors for when the doors are off. They work great, stick well and were very affordable. Well worth it. Mirrors should come with integrated blind spot mirrors but since some don’t, these are mandatory in my opinion. Makes driving a much safer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A very inexpensive safety device that works
customer_reviews.text: A very inexpensive safety device that works. These things provide a white image of the area around you, are easy to install, and provide a high level of safety for a very low cost. I installed them on an old 3/4 ton truck that does not have radar base sensors or anything fancy, and they gave me a lot more confidence driving in urban traffic
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the mirror
customer_reviews.text: Recently traded in my vehicle and the new one did not come with blind spot mirrors. I didn't realize how much I relied on them until I didn't have them. These blind spot mirrors are perfect for my Kia Sedona Mini-Van. They give me a full range of view. It is a great purchase price as well, as you get 4 mirrors. Every car should have blind spot mirrors on them.
customer_reviews.author: PWSWORLD

customer_reviews.title: they do make a huge difference!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife. She has a little confidence issue when she's driving and these mirrors help a lot. In Houston people drive very erratically so you need to have your eyes open all the time. These mirrors really do make a difference and they come in very handy when you're driving on the highway. your view changes dramatically and you're able to cover a large area. If you want to be safe , invest in these mirrors. The seller was very easy to deal with and the product arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Asit

customer_reviews.title: Great Non-Adjustable Blindspot Mirror
customer_reviews.text: Interestingly, there are not very many non-adjustable blindspot mirrors on the market. However, if you are in the market for them, these are definitely a great choice. They get the job done, look professional, and most importantly keep you safe when driving. Just be sure to sit in the driver's seat to properly position where you would want them before you mount them. I have been very happy with this purchase. The only oddity is that they give you 4... So you could put them on another car too.
customer_reviews.author: TheScottyZ

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2010 Honda CRV. Not only did they not show blind spots, they made using my side view mirrors confusing. They send you 2 pairs. I have one pair left and they are going in the garbage. I wouldn't give the extra pair to a friend. Maybe they just weren't right for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive / Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Used some fishing line to easily remove some very old stick-on mirrors. These new ones affix flat to the outside mirrors of my vehicle. Flat means they do not create any shadow / dead spot like the newer adjustable stick-on mirrors would. Price was great for 2-pack and they do the expected job.
customer_reviews.author: 007Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Solution for blind spots
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this item the reason I bought them again was because I got into an accident with my old car and I had to get them for my new car because they are so helpful! I like the bigger magnification I feel like I can see anyting!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blind spot mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Used these on our 1995 Jeep Cherokee and our 2004 GMC Yukon. They are small so they can be positioned on the top outside corner Yukon mirrors and not block the turn signal indicator.
customer_reviews.author: 95Z28A4

customer_reviews.title: Simply junk! Avoid it!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I got today as a "brand new product". Looks like they used the product for many years before to sell it. Just see the pictures. Btw looks like they believe "4 Pack" consist from 2 [not 4] mirrors
customer_reviews.author: Ivn

customer_reviews.title: These work well! 2 pairs in a pack
customer_reviews.text: My newer car didn’t have these as before, so I had to buy these after almost getting into accident on the expressway. Easy to put on! Stay on even in AZ heat. I gave the other pair for my parents car and they love these as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mellie gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product, at a great price...
customer_reviews.text: This is a foolproof solution for your blind spot. I order a couple of the to install on my son's car, and the results are great, in my case I find out that the best place to install then is in the inside top corner of your mirrors, besides the placement there's nothing to figure out, I used a little alcohol to clean the mirror, and then installed using the self adhesive tape. Great product, at a great price...
customer_reviews.author: Tito Dj

customer_reviews.title: Seem to Be Working!
customer_reviews.text: These little blind spot mirrors are doing exactly what I hoped - helping me see my blind spots! They were easy to install and look good on my mirrors. I like the thin aluminum frame, although I wish it was black to match my mirror frames. The only thing I haven't tested yet is the adhesive. I'll be going to the car wash soon, so we'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Landon J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! After driving a rental vehicle with similar mirrors, I went hunting for something to add to my daily driver. These are perfect. Adhered with no issues. Have been in place well over a month and no problems yet. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this product! I have had them on every vehicle I have owned and I have never been disappointed! The adhesive is strong and lasts several years before needing to be replaced. They are the perfect size for both cars and a SUV! I absolutely love them and will continue to by them!
customer_reviews.author: AvidGamer

customer_reviews.title: Tried one other blind spot mirror then tried these.
customer_reviews.text: I tried another blind spot mirror from amazon that was adjustable and every time through the carwash they would come out wonky and need readjustment. I tossed those and got these. Best decision ever made for blind spot mirrors. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Houseman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Product description was spot on! Most blind spot mirrors come with an adjustment base which really is so unnecessary. Auto stores only seem to carry these newer adjustment based mirrors, so I was pleasantly surprised to find these flat based mirrors on Amazon. These mirrors attach easily and sit flat against my rear view mirror. Their design assures great view of your blind spot. Trust me... these are the ones to get!
customer_reviews.author: ScrewE

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed, easily removed (if so desired)
customer_reviews.text: Have used these on vehicles and motorcycles for 20+ years. Easily installed, easily removed (if so desired). The only setback that I've encountered is that, in the extreme Texas heat, the adhesive on a couple of occasions has melted loose. A little Goo-Gone and wait for things to cool down just a bit and reapply.
customer_reviews.author: FWRay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I lived the ease of installation. It definitely provides the line of sight needed to avoid changing lanes if another car is in your blind spot. In addition, it also helps you easily view parking lines when back parking.
customer_reviews.author: Gemonthego

customer_reviews.title: Helps me drive safely in traffic
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure how I would like this but it's great. Really useful. I drive in Houston freeway traffic and I think using this has made me a safer driver because I can more easily see things in my blind spot. I was worried I might miss the space on my side view mirror taken up by this little mirror but I don't at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Little Mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for the old style, non-adjustable, blind spot mirrors that simply stick to the side view mirrors. These are perfect!! So far they seem to stick very nicely, are very clear and are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Lurch

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Joy Joy!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several different similar products and just wasn't happy with what I found... until I saw This is EXACTLY what I was looking for and the price makes it even better! I received the mirrors on schedule and they work perfectly. I just couldn't be any happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good little mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little mirrors...so far the little guy is hanging on like a champ! I would say they could be a bit bigger, but at least for the driver side mirror I am using it on (2000 Pontiac Montana) it does provide the critical function of identifying anything in my blind spot. I also wish they came in 2-packs at a reduced price. By the time I need to replace this one, I'll probably never find the bag with the 3 in waiting!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lyell

customer_reviews.title: Not top quality
customer_reviews.text: One arrived broken, and the quality does not seem to be up to par. was disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Blind spot viewing a must
customer_reviews.text: I constantly check my mirrors when driving, particularly on expressways. My former vehicle had the blind spot mirror section intrgral with the driver side mirror My new current car does not have this not the electronic detection system. I feel this type of mirror is essential for safe driving,
customer_reviews.author: joecosk

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i didn't like the mirrors with frames or wobbly things behind them. i wanted a flat, frame-less mirror to check for blind spots. this mirror fits the bill. it doesn't look like an add on. i don't worry about it coming off in the car wash because the package contains 4 mirrors. when i glance at the mirror i am not distracted by a frame.
customer_reviews.author: GJohnson

customer_reviews.title: Good to be a safer driver.
customer_reviews.text: After i almost ran someone off the road, i looked for this. My work electric vehicle nissan leaf has unusually short side mirrors. After adding this mirror, my vision seemed have broadened. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mp

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seller, who value there customers!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service and seller who value there customers! I had a situation with the item and seller responded quickly and took care of the situation. All my vehicles I use this blind spot mirrors, so in my opinion this is great buy and nice product. Btw this is my second purchase from this seller for the same item since I purchased another vehicle for my son. Thank you 🤙🏽
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: These are nothing like the ones that come on cars these days
customer_reviews.text: These are nothing like the ones that come on cars these days. After driving a Ford Transit that had blind spot mirrors built in, I found myself missing them when I transitioned to another vehicle. That's where these came in. They are very small and do not, in any way, magnify your blind spot, but gives you a clear view as to if there is another vehicle there. These are made like the old ones my grandfather had on his Buick. Cheap plastic, no magnification, and stuck on by double sided sticky pad. Not much to them really.
customer_reviews.author: mrjrclark

customer_reviews.title: Essential Blind Spot Mirror
customer_reviews.text: The Blind Spot Mirrors arrived quickly and are well packaged. The foam adhesive disk is nearly 1.5' in diameter which should provide plenty of surface area to attach to the mirror, My only negative comment was that one of the adhesive disks was not well centered on the back of the mirror (see attached). i bought these for my wife''s car since she it not have a built-in blind spot monitoring system.
customer_reviews.author: Tenfore

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure how long the 3M tape will last but this is a bargain for a piece of mind on while driving in the road. I’ve installed both sets in both my cars and they make a big difference with the blind spot issue all sedans have. I recommend this product, no need to spend $$$ for similar items.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, reasonable price. I used two of them on a 2015 Chevrolet Equinox installed in the lower, outside corner and they fit and function as I had hoped they would. They pick up the blind spots on this SUV when driving, backing up and while parking perfectly and don't overly obstruct the rest of the mirror for it's intended purpose. The fit is close to the mirror surface so I can't see behind it and the generous double sided mounting tape seems to be more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought an older vehicle that doesn't have blind spot mirrors like my newer one, and though it's not a daily driver, when I do drive it I miss not being able know when I have someone in that blind spot. These did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: 9357shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good size. I like the metal parts instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size. I like the metal parts instead of plastic. It's not a 3M backing/sticker, but I put them on before Christmas and I've had no issues. My only complaint is that one of the 4 mirrors was scratched so bad it was unusable. It's a good thing they send 2 sets of 2 instead of just 1. That flaw almost earned 3 stars from me, but I got a usable pair and they work just fine. So I'll give 'em 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: I can see the curb.
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of always having to lower my mirrors to see the lines or the curb when parking. Now I can park into a spot with more visibility. I don’t normally use them for blind spot because I know how to shoulder check before changing lanes.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS A

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as expected -- a small mirror that can be taped to your car's side mirror. Only just put it on but I can tell that it may take some time to get used to using it because cars look to be very small in the mirror but they're actually much closer. However that's probably more to do with the nature of blind spot mirrors rather than this one in particular. So far it definitely seems it will be useful to have when changing lanes.
customer_reviews.author: by12on

customer_reviews.title: Best blind spot mirror out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is far and away the best blind spot mirrors I’ve ever had! Install them bottom left on drivers side and bottom right passenger side. Driving thru car wash or washing the car yourself it eliminates continually having to adjust and readjust...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great set of mirrors
customer_reviews.text: These spot mirrors with the small chrome ring border are really hard to find. I just put them on my new 2016 Maxima yesterday and they work great and they are nearly all mirror unlike a lot of the others available that have a large border ring taking up too much of the mirror. The quality of these seem very good and they are very clear. I'm glad I found these as they are getting really hard to find locally.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Every car I've owned has these.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe they're not as critical with blind spot warning systems and back-up cameras, but they still come in handy for getting close to the curb when parallel parking.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Giacomelli

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective Spot mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these 'Spot' mirrors for years and I prefer the ones in an aluminum frame. Had enough to do both my vehicles. No problem with the adhesive at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tucci

customer_reviews.title: Priceless
customer_reviews.text: My wife drives a 370Z and if you've ever been in one, it probably has one of the worst blind spots (both sides) of all vehicles. These mirrors are key to being able to safely change lanes. As for the quality of the mirror themselves, I've only had them on a couple of days but the reflective surface is clear, images are not distorted, and the sticky surface seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Little Added Visibility
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to install and appear to stick well, but the mirrors are barely convex at all and only provide 10-20 extra degrees of visibility. These are not convex enough to act as an actual blind spot mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Bike Commuter

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors Look Great
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors look like they are going to work great. I haven't installed them because of health reasons, but feel they will be just fine. I'll try and update you when they are installed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: simple yet efficient - best value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I tried other blind spot mirrors that pivot or can be adjusted to a different angle; they eventually move around. These simple ones are the best, and allow viewing at all angles.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good value and effective blind spot mirrors
customer_reviews.text: Not crystal clear, but pretty close (it is nice they are glass with solid back). I trimmed adhesive slightly to avoid some high-spots on back; this seemed to allow mirror to adhere more evenly to rear-view mirrors. Driver side works great, passenger side is OK (mainly because it appears small from viewing distance of driver seat). Defiantly worth the price especially since they came as a 4-pack (well, two 2-packs).
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I had actually bought some other ones because no stores seem to carry actual mirror ones in store, so I had to grab some fishing line and remove the cheap ones I bought and put these bad boys on! I am very pleased with these. So much better then the cheap reflective tape kind all over the place now.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The Best Blind Spot Mirrors are a decent quality and were ...
customer_reviews.text: The Best Blind Spot Mirrors are a decent quality and were very easy to install. We actually like that the border is not too thick or dark like other spot mirrors on the market. We would purchase these spot meters again if we need spot mirrors. If we experience any problems with these spot mirrors, we will report back on the review.
customer_reviews.author: Homeowner

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: They serve the purpose. They stick well, & don't occupy much space on the actual side mirrors. They also look pretty on the mirrors, & allow me to see far into the surroundings.
customer_reviews.author: Mehr

customer_reviews.title: use on all our cars
customer_reviews.text: simple but effective, out on kids cars and wifes. not one person noticed I did it, but the use without knowing.works well for blind spots jiust clean mirror and stick on far outer edge.
customer_reviews.author: lewtus

customer_reviews.title: These blind spot mirrors worked perfectly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my Ford Ranger pick up truck, I just purchased it used and it didn't have a blind spot mirror but it definitely had a blind spot. I searched for a good one and with all the great reviews, I decided to purchase these Best Blind spot mirrors and I am so glad I did, they work perfectly and I am now more at ease that I can now see objects in my previous blind spot. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a mirror for their blind spot issues.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: This mirror is the best one that I have had
customer_reviews.text: This mirror is the best one that I have had. It does the job perfectly & I would recommend this to all who are looking for a blind spot mirror. It sticks on easily and strong, it does not appear that it will come off easily. I have been looking for something this good for a long time & this certainly does the job. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: KOB

customer_reviews.title: No more car honks from blind side
customer_reviews.text: The vendor shipped as promised and accurate product description. It fits our BMW and Murano. The adhesion sticker on Murano did not stick and used a glue.
customer_reviews.author: Mac354

customer_reviews.title: Great fisheye view so as to avoid accidents
customer_reviews.text: These have been amazing. I couldn’t see very well on the passenger’s side and that worry of clipping someone in my blind spot has been eliminated. It works better than the factory integrated one one the driver’s side.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C. Vivian-ochs

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution to get rid of blind spot
customer_reviews.text: Quick and effective solution to get rid of blind spot. I've been adjusting the sideview mirror ever since I got my car, a Volkswagen Passat. I was a bit skeptical when I got these mirrors that it would be effective. But it works. Approaching cars do look that they are further away in the small mirror but those cars are seen on my sideview mirror as they always have. But when I can't see those cars in my sideview mirror, that's when I can see those cars in the blind spot mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ordinary consumer

customer_reviews.title: Mirrors are perfect for the blind spot. Easy to install and use.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of use in these side mirrors. Easy to install and most helpful to see beyond the blind spot along side and back of car.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little mirrors for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little mirrors for a great price. You get a nice wide angle view for the side without turning your head and you also get a nice wide angle view for the bottom so can easily see the parking lines when backing into a parking spot or getting close to the curb. Don't let the cheap packaging fool you, they're great mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great, sleek, high vision mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are great. The very thin rim makes them appear to be part of the mirror. The same tiny rim maximizes your view. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: TXDiver

customer_reviews.title: Small investment to increase your driving safety.
customer_reviews.text: The Blind Spot Mirrors work quite well in regards to providing that extended view that normal mirrors cannot provide. I mounted them on a 2013 Chevy Avalanche. I find the mirrors especially useful when parking in reverse. Power Auto also does a great job providing customer service. They initiated several emails to me with tips to ensure that I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: DSchiff

customer_reviews.title: True to size and great value
customer_reviews.text: These mirrors are very minimal in frame and design, which works perfect for cars like mine that have blind spot indicators that shouldn't be covered up. I went with these because I wanted 2" but couldn't fit an additional fat plastic frame. Critical also is that they won't rust! The convex shape is just the right amount. The extra pair has come in handy putting one on the rear view mirror for even better blind spot protection and one on my computer monitor at work to see if someone has entered my office while my back is turned. No complaints at all with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great for small  mirrors.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Rear view mirrors on my car are not too big. These mirrors were just the right size and very compact. Not too high.
customer_reviews.author: WA

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my wife. They came as a set of two so my wife installed the second set on our teenager's car. They both love them and say they work just as described, helping them see their blind spot as needed. They seem to have adhered to the mirrors well and still feel stuck well after a week of Florida heat!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Found another great use for them.
customer_reviews.text: We actually purchased these to put in the bottom of our hanging solar lamps to add to the brightness. Wow! What a difference! My husband is a genius. His idea.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Flush to the mirror, added safety.
customer_reviews.text: Stuck very well. Very clear. Takes a little bit to learn how to use them on the road. Sounds funny, but they're small enough, you need to really look to see if there is a car in the blind spot. Now that I've gotten used to them, I'll never be able to go without! Put them on all of the family cars.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Low

customer_reviews.title: Not much of a wide view
customer_reviews.text: These stick great and I have been through the car wash several times with them. The only problem is they don't have much of a wide view.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fell Off a Week later
customer_reviews.text: The mirror itself seemed nice enough, but installed exactly as specified and if fell off less than a week later. The adhesive on the back only covered about 75% of the mirror to start with, and obviously didn't hold up well enough. I will be ordering another brand that covers the entire mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Its a mirror
customer_reviews.text: Correctly placed, it increases your field of view which is very useful when driving. It also has a bonus function of flagging idiots on the road -- people who put this type of mirror on the inside of the car mirror are inevitably lousy drivers, so when you see that it enables you to avoid them. Good adhesion to a clean mirror surface, reflects clearly without waviness or other distortion.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Hollinshead

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Discreet and excellent adherence. Been stuck on the car for 3y now. Only thing that's missing are different shapes other than round to look more OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Lopes

customer_reviews.title: A very Bright Blind Spot Mirro
customer_reviews.text: Was pleased with these mirrors, the reflection is nice an bright. I have some in the past that make the reflection look yellow, not these nice a crisp. Easy to install and they are all one piece so nothing to fall off in the car wash.
customer_reviews.author: Ana in CT

customer_reviews.title: GOOD TO HAVE
customer_reviews.text: My sister has arthritis in her neck and has difficulty turning her head. This mirror allows her to see if another car is in the lane next to her.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Very clear and stick very well. Bought several for my other vehicles. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Villam L
